tool_description: An API collecting data on sporting events (NBA and UFC) with available betting odds.
name: Sports Data
title: Sports Data

api_list.name: UFC Events
api_list.description: Get data on all upcoming UFC events with available betting data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-data3.p.rapidapi.com/ufc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-data3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get NBA data for specific game
api_list.description: Enter team name (example: heat, miami, mia, celtics, boston, bos) as team parameter to get score (if live), starters, and betting data on that game.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-data3.p.rapidapi.com/nba/pacers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-data3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-data3.p.rapidapi.com/nba/{team}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-data3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all NBA games for day
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all NBA games for that day
